auto_detect.title: Auto-Detecting Energy Sensors
auto_detect.description:
Scanning your Home Assistant Energy Dashboard and devices...

We prefer cumulative energy sensors (kWh) because they provide the most reliable data for optimization. The backend will automatically compute power values from these.

This may take 10-15 seconds.

review.title: Review & Select Sensors
review.description:
We recommend using the following cumulative energy sensors (kWh). Select from the dropdown or enter a custom entity ID below each sensor.

‚úÖ Cumulative sensors provide the most reliable data
üìù Custom fields override dropdown selections

data_description.solar_production: Select cumulative solar energy production sensor (kWh preferred)
data_description.solar_production_custom: Leave blank to use dropdown selection above
data_description.battery_soc_custom: Leave blank to use dropdown selection above
data_description.grid_import: Select cumulative energy imported from grid (kWh preferred)
data_description.grid_import_custom: Leave blank to use dropdown selection above
data_description.grid_export: Select cumulative energy exported to grid (kWh preferred)
data_description.grid_export_custom: Leave blank to use dropdown selection above
data_description.house_load: OPTIONAL - If not provided, will be auto-calculated from: Solar + Battery Discharge + Grid Import - Battery Charge - Grid Export
data_description.house_load_custom: Leave blank to use dropdown selection above or to auto-calculate
